Headline: Update: 95th/Dan Ryan-bound Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: Update: 95th-bound Red Line trains are temp. rerouted to the elevated tracks between Fullerton and Cermak due to a medical emerg. on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Update: 95th-bound Red Line trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated tracks between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

Red Line service to 95th/Dan Ryan

After stopping at Fullerton, 95th-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Armitage (accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Cermak-Chinatown and make all normal stops to 95th/Dan Ryan.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown.

Connections can be made between Howard-bound subway service and 95th-bound rerouted service via elevated lines at Fullerton (accessible), State/Lake (board at nearby elevated station on Orange Line side for 95th-bound Red Line service) and at Roosevelt (accessible).

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at North/Clybourn.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Monroe
ShortDescription: SB 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Wacker, Clark, Ida B. Wells, and State due to, street blockage near Monroe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Wacker, Clark, Ida B. Wells, and State due to, street blockage near Monroe.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #10 Museum of Science & Industry Temporary Reroute near Monroe
ShortDescription: 10 Museum of Science & Industry buses temp. rerouted SB: Wacker, Clark, Ida B. Wells and State; NB: State, Clark, Dearborn, Wacker and State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#10 Museum of Science & Industry buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Monroe, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Wacker, Clark, Ida B. Wells and State.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Clark, Dearborn, Wacker and State.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Monroe, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via State, Wacker, Clark, Ida B. Wells and State.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Adams, Dearborn, Wacker and State.

Allow extra travel time.
